alert.note: Alert for Black Mesa Area; Chinle Valley; Chuska Mountains and Defiance Plateau; Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Kaibab Plateau; Marble and Glen Canyons; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas Hwy 264 Northward; Northeast Plateaus and Mesas South of Hwy 264; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 6:41PM MST until February 21 at 9:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph. * WHERE...Much of northern and west-central Arizona. * WHEN...Until 9 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Areas of blowing dust with reduced visibility have been reported in the western Grand Canyon through Page areas. Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Minor tree damage and spotty power outages are also possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
